Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-SHa G10K analog (Synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) totemporin-SHaL: 23%, F=G=K: 15%.Chemical modification:  C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against Gram- bacteria A. baumannii DSM 30007 (MIC 3.12 uM), E. cloacae DSM 30054 (MIC 12.5 uM), E. coli ATCC 8739 (MIC 25 uM), H. pylori ATCC 43504 (MIC 3.12 uM), K. pneumonia DSM 26371 (MIC25 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC 25 uM), Gram+ bacteria B. subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC 3.12 uM), E. faecalis DSM 2570 (MIC 6.25 uM), E. faecium DSM 20477 (MIC 6.25 uM), and S. aureus ATCC 6538 (MIC 3.12 uM).Anticancer: Breast Cancer MCF-7, Liver Cancer HepG-2, Ovarian Cancer A2780, Pancreatic Cancer MiaPaCa-2, Prostate Cancer PC-3, Skin Cancer MNT-1, Lung Cancer A549 (IC50 11.7-64 uM).Structure:  helical in SDS.In vitro toxicity:  normal lung fibroblast IMR-90 (IC50 >100 uM) and normal Lung epithelium BEAS-2B (IC50 74.8 uM). Poor cell selectivity relative to cancer cells.
Literature Information.Author: Khan AI, Nazir S, Haque MNU, Maharjan R, Khan FA, Olleik H, Courvoisier-Dezord E, Maresca M, Shaheen F. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis of Second-Generation Analogs of Temporin-SHa Peptide Having Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial and Anticancer Effects
